mapper.select: select * from log l where l.id = #{_parameter}
select * from log l where l.name like '%'+#{username}+'%' and l.common like '%'+#{common}+'%' and l.create_date <=] #{createDate}
mapper.update: update log l set l.name=#{name},l.common=#{common},l.project_name=#{projectName},l.create_date=#{createDate},l.update_date=#{updateDate},l.state=#{state} where l.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from log l where l.id = #{_parameter}
